unit.title: Output Spatial unit
unit.description: Number of the spatial unit that we want to generate an output for. This could be the spatial unit for a river section, HRU, or LSU as defined by the Tordera watershed delineation in (LINK TO WATERSHED MAP)

file.title: SWAT Output File
file.description: SWAT Output File to use. Example: 'channel_sd_day'. For possible values, please check the SWAT documentation (https://swatplus.gitbook.io/io-docs), SWAT+ OUTPUT FILES section. Outputs can be obtained at different time steps by appending a suffix to the output file: _day for daily, _mon for monthly, _yr for yearly, and _aa for annual average.

variable.title: SWAT Variable
variable.description: Variable to simulate. Example: 'flo_out'. For possible values, please check the SWAT documentation (https://swatplus.gitbook.io/io-docs) inside each of the SWAT+ OUTPUT FILES sections.

start_date.title: Start date
start_date.description: Start date of the simulation in the format yyyymmdd. Defaults to: 20160101. Earliest possible date: 20000101.

start_date_print.title: Start date
start_date_print.description: Start date for printing in the format yyyymmdd. Defaults to: 20190601. Earliest possible date: 20020101. It is recommended to allow for at least two warm-up years between the model simulation start and the model output printing to ensure relevant results

end_date.title: End date
end_date.description: End date of the simulation in the format yyyymmdd. Defaults to: 20201231. Latest possible date: 20221231.

swat_output_file.title: Some output param Amanda
swat_output_file.description: The result as a SWAT output file.

parameter_calibration.title: Parameter Calibration
parameter_calibration.description: SWAT Parameter calibration used by the simulation, calibrated by Amanda Batlle, CREAF, Barcelona, Spain (TODO - AManda what needs to be here?).
